title: Jay Glazer, Cris Collinsworth, and the Best Coaches of 2020 | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Fox Sports’s Jay Glazer joins Kevin to discuss the Philadelphia Eagles quarterback situation, Tom Brady and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, the coaching carousel, and more (1:25). Then, The Ringer’s Danny Kelly and Nora Princiotti join the show to talk about the three best coaches of the season (19:25). Kevin then talks with NBC’s Cris Collinsworth in an extended version of The Ringer’s video series ‘Slow News Day’ (57:24).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Jay Glazer, Danny Kelly, Nora Princiotti, and Cris Collinsworth
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
